topics.body:
I just loved the characters, I loved interactions, I love the effects, I loved the dinosaurs

[spoiler] Seriously when shit happened to them it hit me, when the brontosaurus was lying on the ground dying, I got fucking sniffles
And god when, the fucking viloceraptors were getting killed
Each time made my heart fucking stop
Thinking about it honestly messing me up [/spoiler]
topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a

topics.body:
I think what I loved a lot, was that it was it's own movie

It's not like the Terminator sequals or the new Star Trek, which constantly just use popular lines from the old movies, or recycle plots

It tried to be original in most ways

I woke up saw the 100th episode and liked it!

I am really hyper with glee!
